title: Strengthening Service Quality Practical Competencies: Flipped Learning-Based Corporate Practitioner Language Proficiency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can use professional language expressions applicable to real-world situations with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can improve their language proficiency by two levels based on peer feedback in online discussions.
Learners can communicate in the target language in real-world work scenarios through project-based assessments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
